verses.verse: ה֣וֹי <WH1945> Ho Woe שׁוֹדֵ֗ד <WH7703> sho-Ded, to thee that spoilest וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> ve-'at-Tah you לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo were not שָׁד֔וּד <WH7703> sha-Dud, and thou [wast] not spoiled וּבוֹגֵ֖ד <WH898> u-vo-Ged and dealest treacherously וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- while did not בָ֣גְדוּ <WH898> Va-ge-du and they dealt not treacherously ב֑וֹ vo; כַּהֲתִֽמְךָ֤ <WH8552> ka-ha-tim-Cha with thee when thou shalt cease שׁוֹדֵד֙ <WH7703> sho-Ded to spoil תּוּשַּׁ֔ד <WH7703> tush-Shad, thou shalt be spoiled כַּנְּלֹתְךָ֥ <WH5239> kan-ne-lo-te-Cha [and] when thou shalt make an end לִבְגֹּ֖ד <WH898> liv-God to deal treacherously יִבְגְּדוּ־ <WH898> yiv-ge-du- they shall deal treacherously בָֽךְ׃ Vach. ס sa-Mek

יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD חָנֵּ֖נוּ <WH2603> chan-Ne-nu be gracious לְךָ֣ le-Cha קִוִּ֑ינוּ <WH6960> kiv-Vi-nu; unto us we have waited הֱיֵ֤ה <WH1961> he-Yeh become זְרֹעָם֙ <WH2220> ze-ro-'Am for thee be thou their arm לַבְּקָרִ֔ים <WH1242> lab-be-ka-Rim, every morning אַף־ <WH637> 'af- also יְשׁוּעָתֵ֖נוּ <WH3444> ye-shu-'a-Te-nu our salvation בְּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> be-'Et also in the time צָרָֽה׃ <WH6869> tza-Rah. of trouble

מִקּ֣וֹל <WH6963> mik-Kol At the noise הָמ֔וֹן <WH1995> ha-Mon, of the tumult נָדְד֖וּ <WH5074> na-de-Du fled עַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> 'am-Mim; the people מֵר֣וֹמְמֻתֶ֔ךָ <WH7427> me-Rom-mu-Te-cha, at the lifting up נָפְצ֖וּ <WH5310> na-fe-Tzu were scattered גּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> go-Yim. of thyself the nations

וְאֻסַּ֣ף <WH622> ve-'us-Saf shall be gathered שְׁלַלְכֶ֔ם <WH7998> she-lal-Chem, And your spoil אֹ֖סֶף <WH625> 'O-sef [like] the gathering הֶֽחָסִ֑יל <WH2625> he-cha-Sil; of the caterpiller כְּמַשַּׁ֥ק <WH4944> ke-mash-Shak as the running to and fro גֵּבִ֖ים <WH1357> ge-Vim of locusts שׁוֹקֵ֥ק <WH8264> sho-Kek shall he run בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

נִשְׂגָּ֣ב <WH7682> nis-Gav is exalted יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, The LORD כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for שֹׁכֵ֖ן <WH7931> sho-Chen for he dwelleth מָר֑וֹם <WH4791> ma-Rom; on high מִלֵּ֣א <WH4390> mil-Le he hath filled צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> tzi-Yon, Zion מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> mish-Pat with judgment וּצְדָקָֽה׃ <WH6666> u-tze-da-Kah. and righteousness

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become אֱמוּנַ֣ת <WH530> 'e-mu-Nat shall be the stability עִתֶּ֔יךָ <WH6256> 'it-Tei-cha, of thy times חֹ֥סֶן <WH2633> Cho-sen [and] strength יְשׁוּעֹ֖ת <WH3444> ye-shu-'Ot of salvation חָכְמַ֣ת <WH2451> cha-che-Mat And wisdom וָדָ֑עַת <WH1847> va-Da-'at; and knowledge יִרְאַ֥ת <WH3374> yir-'At the fear יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD הִ֥יא <WH1931> hi he אוֹצָרֽוֹ׃ <WH214> o-tza-Ro. [is] his treasure ס sa-Mek

הֵ֚ן <WH2005> hen Behold אֶרְאֶלָּ֔ם <WH691> 'er-'el-Lam, Behold their valiant ones צָעֲק֖וּ <WH6817> tza-'a-Ku shall cry חֻ֑צָה <WH2351> Chu-tzah; without מַלְאֲכֵ֣י <WH4397> mal-'a-Chei the ambassadors שָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> sha-Lom, of peace מַ֖ר <WH4751> mar bitterly יִבְכָּיֽוּן׃ <WH1058> yiv-ka-Yun. shall weep

נָשַׁ֣מּוּ <WH8074> na-Sham-mu lie waste מְסִלּ֔וֹת <WH4546> me-sil-Lot, The highways שָׁבַ֖ת <WH7673> sha-Vat ceaseth עֹבֵ֣ר <WH5674> 'o-Ver the traveler אֹ֑רַח <WH734> 'O-rach; manner הֵפֵ֤ר <WH6565> he-Fer he hath broken בְּרִית֙ <WH1285> be-Rit the covenant מָאַ֣ס <WH3988> ma-'As he hath despised עָרִ֔ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim, the cities לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo has no חָשַׁ֖ב <WH2803> cha-Shav he regardeth אֱנֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH376> e-Noosh. he

אָבַ֤ל <WH56> 'a-Val mourneth אֻמְלְלָה֙ <WH535> 'um-le-Lah [and] languisheth אָ֔רֶץ <WH776> 'A-retz, The earth הֶחְפִּ֥יר <WH2659> hech-Pir is ashamed לְבָנ֖וֹן <WH3844> le-va-Non Lebanon קָמַ֑ל <WH7060> ka-Mal; [and] hewn down הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> ha-Yah become הַשָּׁרוֹן֙ <WH8289> hash-sha-rOn Sharon כָּֽעֲרָבָ֔ה <WH6160> ka-'a-ra-Vah, is like a wilderness וְנֹעֵ֥ר <WH5287> ve-no-'Er shake off בָּשָׁ֖ן <WH1316> ba-Shan and Bashan וְכַרְמֶֽל׃ <WH3760> ve-char-Mel. and Carmel

עַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> 'at-Tah Now אָק֖וּם <WH6965> 'a-Kum Now will I rise יֹאמַ֣ר <WH559> yo-Mar saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> 'at-Tah Now אֵֽרוֹמָ֔ם <WH7311> e-ro-Mam, bring up עַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> 'at-Tah now אֶנָּשֵֽׂא׃ <WH5375> 'en-na-Se. now will I lift up

תַּהֲר֥וּ <WH2029> ta-ha-Ru Ye shall conceive חֲשַׁ֖שׁ <WH2842> cha-Shash chaff תֵּ֣לְדוּ <WH3205> Te-le-du ye shall bring forth קַ֑שׁ <WH7179> Kash; stubble רוּחֲכֶ֕ם <WH7307> ru-cha-Chem your breath אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> 'esh [as] fire תֹּאכַלְכֶֽם׃ <WH398> to-chal-Chem. shall devour

וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu become עַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> 'am-Mim And the people מִשְׂרְפ֣וֹת <WH4955> mis-re-Fot shall be [as] the burnings שִׂ֑יד <WH7875> Sid; of lime קוֹצִ֥ים <WH6975> ko-Tzim [as] thorns כְּסוּחִ֖ים <WH3683> ke-su-Chim cut up בָּאֵ֥שׁ <WH784> ba-'Esh in the fire יִצַּֽתּוּ׃ <WH3341> yitz-Tzat-tu. shall they be burned ס sa-Mek

שִׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> shim-'U Hear רְחוֹקִ֖ים <WH7350> re-cho-Kim ye [that are] far off אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher what עָשִׂ֑יתִי <WH6213> 'a-Si-ti; what I have done וּדְע֥וּ <WH3045> u-de-'U acknowledge קְרוֹבִ֖ים <WH7138> ke-ro-Vim and ye [that are] near גְּבֻרָתִֽי׃ <WH1369> ge-vu-ra-Ti. my might

פָּחֲד֤וּ <WH6342> pa-cha-Du are afraid בְצִיּוֹן֙ <WH6726> ve-tzi-yOn in Zion חַטָּאִ֔ים <WH2400> chat-ta-'Im, The sinners אָחֲזָ֥ה <WH270> 'a-cha-Zah hath surprised רְעָדָ֖ה <WH7461> re-'a-Dah fearfulness חֲנֵפִ֑ים <WH2611> cha-ne-Fim; the hypocrites מִ֣י׀ <WH4310> mi Who יָג֣וּר <WH1481> ya-Gur Who among us shall dwell לָ֗נוּ La-nu, אֵ֚שׁ <WH784> 'esh burning אוֹכֵלָ֔ה <WH398> o-che-Lah, with the devouring מִי־ <WH4310> mi- Who יָג֥וּר <WH1481> ya-Gur live לָ֖נוּ La-nu מוֹקְדֵ֥י <WH4168> mok-Dei burning עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> o-Lam. with everlasting

הֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> ho-Lech He that walketh צְדָק֔וֹת <WH6666> tze-da-Kot, righteously וְדֹבֵ֖ר <WH1696> ve-do-Ver and speaketh מֵֽישָׁרִ֑ים <WH4339> mei-sha-Rim; uprightly מֹאֵ֞ס <WH3988> mo-'Es he that despiseth בְּבֶ֣צַע <WH1215> be-Ve-tza' the gain מַעֲשַׁקּ֗וֹת <WH4642> ma-'a-shak-Kot, of oppressions נֹעֵ֤ר <WH5287> no-'Er that shaketh כַּפָּיו֙ <WH3709> kap-Pav his hands מִתְּמֹ֣ךְ <WH8551> mit-te-Moch from holding בַּשֹּׁ֔חַד <WH7810> bash-Sho-chad, of bribes אֹטֵ֤ם <WH331> 'o-Tem that stoppeth אָזְנוֹ֙ <WH241> a-ze-No his ears מִשְּׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> mish-she-Mo-a' from hearing דָּמִ֔ים <WH1818> da-Mim, of blood וְעֹצֵ֥ם <WH6105> ve-'o-Tzem and shutteth עֵינָ֖יו <WH5869> 'ei-Nav his eyes מֵרְא֥וֹת <WH7200> me-re-'ot from seeing בְּרָֽע׃ <WH7451> be-Ra'. evil

ה֚וּא <WH1931> hu he מְרוֹמִ֣ים <WH4791> me-ro-Mim on high יִשְׁכֹּ֔ן <WH7931> yish-Kon, He shall dwell מְצָד֥וֹת <WH4679> me-tza-Dot [shall be] the munitions סְלָעִ֖ים <WH5553> se-la-'Im of rocks מִשְׂגַּבּ֑וֹ <WH4869> mis-gab-Bo; his place of defence לַחְמ֣וֹ <WH3899> lach-Mo bread נִתָּ֔ן <WH5414> nit-Tan, shall be given מֵימָ֖יו <WH4325> mei-Mav him his waters נֶאֱמָנִֽים׃ <WH539> ne-'e-ma-Nim. [shall be] sure

מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king בְּיָפְי֖וֹ <WH3308> be-ya-fe-Yo in his beauty תֶּחֱזֶ֣ינָה <WH2372> te-che-Zei-nah shall see עֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> 'ei-Nei-cha; Thine eyes תִּרְאֶ֖ינָה <WH7200> tir-'Ei-nah they shall behold אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz the land מַרְחַקִּֽים׃ <WH4801> mar-chak-Kim. that is very far off

לִבְּךָ֖ <WH3820> lib-be-Cha Thine heart יֶהְגֶּ֣ה <WH1897> yeh-Geh shall meditate אֵימָ֑ה <WH367> 'ei-Mah; terror אַיֵּ֤ה <WH346> 'ai-Yeh Where סֹפֵר֙ <WH5608> so-Fer Where [is] the scribe אַיֵּ֣ה <WH346> 'ai-Yeh Where שֹׁקֵ֔ל <WH8254> sho-Kel, ;where [is] the receiver אַיֵּ֖ה <WH346> 'ai-Yeh Where סֹפֵ֥ר <WH5608> so-Fer ;where [is] he that counted אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמִּגְדָּלִֽים׃ <WH4026> ham-mig-da-Lim. castle

אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַ֥ם <WH5971> 'am people נוֹעָ֖ז <WH3267> no-'Az a fierce לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo will no תִרְאֶ֑ה <WH7200> tir-'Eh; Thou shalt not see עַ֣ם <WH5971> 'am a people עִמְקֵ֤י <WH6012> 'im-Kei of a deeper שָׂפָה֙ <WH8193> sa-Fah speech מִשְּׁמ֔וֹעַ <WH8085> mish-she-Mo-a', than thou canst perceive נִלְעַ֥ג <WH3932> nil-'Ag of a stammering לָשׁ֖וֹן <WH3956> la-Shon tongue אֵ֥ין <WH369> 'ein no בִּינָֽה׃ <WH998> bi-Nah. [that thou canst] not understand
